_xResult.title: AYA Linen Tunic
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made light linen tunic with high slit
_xResult.longdesc:
A comfy yet stylish tunic is a must-have for a good layering wardrobe. This custom made top by Shantima is the perfect choice. There are so many details to go crazy for: the A-line flowing fit, round neckline, quarter length sleeves, side, front and back slits, straight hemline and knee length...the list goes on! It'll make for a super flattering fit on any body type. 

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric is already washed and softened and will shrink no more.
